definition: (at a school) to take as an elective/an elective/elective (subject)
dried meat/private teacher's remuneration/withered/variant of 修[xiu1]
to decorate/to embellish/to repair/to build/to write/to cultivate/to study/to take (a class)

sentences.english: The third part studies the use of Language Elective high school textbooks published by People's Education Press.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分是人教版高中语文选修教材的使用研究。

sentences.english: The Spurs might have found another steal in the draft.
sentences.chinese: 马刺很有可能又一次在选修环节中捡了一个大便宜。

sentences.english: This course is an elective course for graduate students in School of Mechanical Engineering.
sentences.chinese: 本课程是机械与动力工程学院研究生的一门选修课。

sentences.english: You just need to have the determination and staying power to self manage the courses you undertake.
sentences.chinese: 你需要的只是决心，以及自我管理所选修课程的耐力。

sentences.english: The project assignment below is directed to students enrolled in the course.
sentences.chinese: 下列所列出的专题会分派给选修这堂课的学生。

sentences.english: Concentrators in geological sciences elect either geology or geography.
sentences.chinese: 选修地质学或地理课程。

sentences.english: See below for the subject list.
In the school of foreign languages, several advanced options are offered for students in their junior or senior years.
sentences.chinese: 外语学院为大三和大四的学生开设了高级选修课。

sentences.english: A student typically takes three courses per term.
sentences.chinese: 标准上，一个学生在每个学期选修三门课程。

sentences.english: In junior high school the student may have a limited choice of subjects.
sentences.chinese: 在初级中学里，学生可以选修一些有限的课程。

sentences.english: Taking a course that contains non-Christian elements is also a bad idea.
sentences.chinese: 选修含有反基督教内容的课程也是错误的。

sentences.english: But it wasn't the number of units he took that marked him as a Reedie.
sentences.chinese: 但是乔布斯没有更多选修课程，使他成为一名里德人。

sentences.english: How would you prefer the school to organize the curriculum for elective subjects?
sentences.chinese: 你希望学校怎样安排学生的选修科目？

sentences.english: Art and the computer class are both on the electives list.
sentences.chinese: 美术课和电脑课都是在选修之列。

sentences.english: As an undergraduate, taking a course in the history of economic thought and reading Malthus.
sentences.chinese: 大学时，我选修过经济思想史，读过马尔萨斯的著作。

sentences.english: The course is restricted to first-year Sloan master's students.
sentences.chinese: 本课程限于史隆管理学院一年级硕士班学生选修。

definition: general course/general education course/core course/general curriculum/general education curriculum/core curriculum
credit system/grading system (in schools, universities etc)
